description: Creates a dataset to connect an external datasource.

parameters.name: datasetSource
parameters.description: The data source for the dataset. The type of data source for the dataset. The format of the dataset source associated with the dataset. sourceDetail (dict) --- The details of the dataset source associated with the dataset. kendra (dict) --- Contains details about the Kendra dataset source. The knowledgeBaseArn details for the Kendra dataset source. The roleARN details for the Kendra dataset source.

nested_params.name: sourceType
nested_params.description: The type of data source for the dataset.

nested_params.name: sourceFormat
nested_params.description: The format of the dataset source associated with the dataset.

nested_params.name: sourceDetail
nested_params.description: The details of the dataset source associated with the dataset.

nested_params.name: kendra
nested_params.description: Contains details about the Kendra dataset source.

nested_params.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_params.description: The knowledgeBaseArn details for the Kendra dataset source.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The roleARN details for the Kendra dataset source.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the access policy. For more information, see Tagging your IoT SiteWise resources in the IoT SiteWise User Guide. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: datasetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset. The format is arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:dataset/${DatasetId}.

nested_items.name: datasetStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset. This contains the state and any error messages. State is CREATING after a successfull call to this API, and any associated error message. The state is ACTIVE when ready to use.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current status of the dataset.
